name: Neuro-Racer
description:
Think fast & Run fast!

Become a champion in the art of calculation as you progress in this amazing endless runner game. You will see how your skills increase in no time.

Compete in different game modes and multiple levels to train your brain solving arithmetic operations. At the same time you improve your reflexes by dodging obstacles

FEATURES
• Exciting and original gameplay.
• Intuitive touch controls to run, jump, and roll.
• Unlock more than 50 levels, and more coming soon.
• You can choose the difficulty, so it is suitable for all ages.
• Complete special events available for a limited time.
• Online scores table for each level and event. Who will take the glory?
